name: Endless Slumber
description:
Endless Slumber is single player tile based puzzle game as you delve deeper into your dreams in order to stay in your continuous state of dreaming.

Team SleepyAF:

Osvaldo Jimenez - Programmer/Audio

Nathan Dias - Programmer

Gahwon Lee - Programmer/Music

Rushil Dandamudi - Programmer

Jimmy Liu - Artist/Animator

Henry Gammad - Lead Designer/Artist
